name: 4 PIECE A WRATH
description:
Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement

Z / J - Attack

C / L - Roll

Progress

Cancelled

Story

Yoghat's beloved wife died of an incurable disease. In an attempt to revive her, he follows the advice of Cresin Scroll's advice to enter the dark realm ( Zomdak ), defeat 4 great evils ( Wrathos, Wrathis, Wrathok, Wrathizal ), and retrieve the Xinophe, an elixir that can revive the dead and cure all illness.

Credits

Design / Programming / Art: Lee Zhi Fei

Music: Rogue Wave - Sleeping Awake
